summary: as the name says, it makes the eyes of the khajiits shine.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][size=4][color=#d8d8d8]ï»¿ADD BRIGHT EYES TO THE KHAJIITS[/color]
[color=#000000]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=#000000]Add your best images![/color]
[color=#000000]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=#d8d8d8]INSTALLATION:[/color]
[color=#000000]recommended use [/color][color=#d8d8d8]NMM[/color][color=#000000] or [/color][color=#d8d8d8]MO(mod organizer)[/color]
[color=#000000]or drag the files in your skyrim folder: [/color][color=#ffff00]\ data \ meshes \ actors \ character \ character assets-[/color]

[color=#ff0000]This mod only affects the eyes of the player, does not affect any npc khajiit in the game, if you want to make a new version with more brightness or affecting the npc communicate with me.[/color][/size][/center]
[img]http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/276/541/14e.png[/img]
author: Draco
